text: Dara Huang (born 1981) is a Taiwanese-American architect. ==Works== In 2013, she founded the architectural design firm Design Haus Liberty. She is the co- founder of Vivahouse, a company that converts abandoned commercial properties into shared living. ==Family== She got together with Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi in 2015, separated finally in 2018 and has 1 child named Christopher Wolfe Mapelli Mozzi who lives with her now. Category:Living people Category:American architects
title: Dara Huang
